messages.subject: I have a virus - don't open mail form my address!
messages.msgSnippet: I just wanted to alert everyone that I seem to have a virus. My virus scan has quarantined this but I keep getting messages that I supposedly sent people with
messages.messageBody:
I just wanted to alert everyone that I seem to have a virus. My virus scan has quarantined this but I keep getting messages that I supposedly sent people with the "could not send message" or user does not accept attachments.

In any case - to be safe please don't open mail from my address - I assume these messages must have an attachment to them - just don't want to infect anyone!

heather
----- Original Message -----
From: myfunny4 <Debbies4@...>
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Friday, January 24, 2003 10:29 AM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: unchurching


--- In Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com, Fetteroll <fetteroll@e...>
wrote:

> Do you mean "Lack of consensus does not imply a lack of toleration?"

That is what I meant.

To predicate means to involve as a connotation; to imply; as, grass
predicates greenness.

>Are you seeing intolerance because there is
> disagreement?

Not at all.

Debbie
